response.summary: “Every challenge, every adversity, contains within it the seeds of opportunity and growth.”
response.skills: Node.js, Typescript, JavaScript, Serverless, Terraform, Amazon Web Services (AWS), hapi.js, Sonarqube, Apache Kafka, Jenkins, PostgreSQL, Angular, RabbitMQ, Laravel, Git, PHP, Software Development, Web Development, Agile Methodologies, Desarrollo de sitios web

profile_positions.description:
As one of the earliest members of the new engineering team in Colombia, I played a key role in integrating new backend technologies related to JavaScript into the company's catalog and reference architecture.

Currently, I am working directly with clients to build their products from scratch using the established reference architecture, which includes tools like Terraform, Jenkins, SonarQube, Graylog, Grafana, Kafka, and many others.
profile_positions.title: Senior Back End Developer

profile_positions.description:
As the technical lead of two different teams, I oversaw the development of distinct solutions tailored to the unique needs of each team.

For the Marketing team, our focus was on creating various implementations to enhance the company's metrics, such as campaigns, referral codes, support, UX, and more.

On the other hand, the Pro team's objective was to cater to high-value clients. To achieve this, we built a platform that used multiple providers to offer the best possible experience for both the clients and the agents that manage large groups of clients.
profile_positions.title: Software Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
Teamed up with the product team to design and implement new features for clients who use the web platform to schedule public services and make credit card payments, as well as accessing other services like foreign exchange, investments, and online payments.
Collaborated with front-end teams in Chile, Peru, Mexico, and Canada to design and implement a new architecture using the ReactJS framework that utilizes common libraries and practices across all countries.
profile_positions.title: Front End Developer

profile_positions.description:
Mercadoni is a grocery delivery app that allows people to purchase from stores and supermarkets using a mobile app or marketplace.

As a developer at Mercadoni, I worked on developing and maintaining new features for the Mercadoni marketplace to reduce customer churn and improve the client experience throughout the shopping process.

In addition, I designed and implemented new software to track the experience of new shoppers, with the goal of improving the quality of service and reducing delivery time for each order.

Teams:
    -Shopper Experience
    -Growth
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Software development startup

Developed a multiplatform car washing application using the React Native framework, which has more than 1600 active users and 4000 completed services. The application utilizes various technologies, such as Redux, Sagas, and Firebase.
Devised and developed a communication protocol from scratch between IoT Crestron hardware and a custom application built using React Native. This integration has enabled the residents of over 200 smart homes to group, classify, and control all their IoT devices seamlessly.

Stack: 
   -React
   -React Native
   -Laravel (PHP)
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
-Developed software projects for multiple clients of the agency, including features like sms and push notifications, leads conversion tracking, realtime reports using D3 library, etc.
-Designed and implemented a roadmap to migrate the consulting technology stack to Javascript using NodeJs and ReactJs.

Stack:
   -Laravel
   -Wordpress
   -Joomla
   -MySQL
   -PostgreSQL
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Developed and maintained a software that help the students of the public universities in Bogotá to receive feedback about their multiple ideas to improve the quality of life to the people in the country.

Stack: 
   -Laravel (PHP)

URL: http://uninnova.unal.edu.co/
profile_positions.title: Junior Software Developer

company.name: BoatyardX
company.description:
At BoatyardX we partner with global brands to design, build and support exceptional software products. We build cutting edge solutions using leading technologies in our three development centres in Dublin (Ireland), Cluj (Romania) and Bogotá (Colombia). Our typical project involves all areas of software development - where we deliver innovative SaaS and Cloud solutions for our clients.
 
BoatyardX is part of Ergo.
